Activity: Check emails and prepare for the stakeholder meeting.

Stakeholder Meeting: Present the detailed requirements specifications, change management plan, and testing strategy to key stakeholders. Gather feedback and address any concerns. @itpm-1 will lead it.
Based on stakeholder feedback, make any necessary revisions to the requirements document, change management plan, and testing strategy.
Finalize the requirements document and obtain sign-off from all key stakeholders. Make sure that @itpm-1 signs off.
Submit the requirements document to the EHR vendor for final review and approval.
Document the entire process and create a knowledge base article for future reference.
Weekly Report: Summarize the accomplishments of the week and outline the plan for next week. Send it to @itpm-1. Shut down the system. Time to relax!
